newsitem.title: USA: Life Bancorp sees $0.075 shr gain in 1997.
newsitem.headline: Life Bancorp sees $0.075 shr gain in 1997.

text.p: Life Bancorp Inc said Tuesday that it expects to add about $1.2 million to its pre-tax income in 1997, resulting in an increase of more than $0.075 in after-tax earnings per share.
The bank attributed the gain to reduced federal deposit insurance premiums lowered by the full recapitalization of the Savings Association Insurance Fund.
Earlier today the bank reported that its share to recapitalize SAIF cost $4.4 million, bringing third quarter earnings per share down to $0.02.
